arrested Last night, November 7, an
aviation safety incident occurred at Da
Nang airport. Flight VM16 blocked Da Nang, Hanoi.
Scheduled to depart at 19:25, had to be
postponed due to  Two male passengers threatened to bring guns
on the plane. The aviation security force
escorted the two people spreading the news of having guns out
of the plane. Security checked
all passengers with hand luggage and
when close to the plane the results were confirmed.  No
dangerous objects or banned explosives were detected,

motel in My Xuyen ward, where six
people were discovered illegally using
bamboo needles in a motel room run by Tran.  Thi Huynh Giao,
born in 2002, and Nguyen Ngoc Thuy Vi,
born in 2004, rented in Long Xuyen. Police

men, who were using drugs. The confiscated items
included four plastic wraps containing
eight white crystals.  two tablets containing a
white powder suspected to be drugs and
many other animals through rapid testing. All
six subjects tested positive for
drugs. The working group also discovered
over 50 laughing gas cylinders in the motel room.

handled using a red book in someone else's name to defraud the
seller and then appropriate 20 billion VND from the
buyer. Today, Dinh Ngoc Binh, 59 years old, residing in
Thanh Khe district, has been investigated by the police.
Da Nang police arrested and
detained people through investigation since 2021. Due to business
losses, Binh had the intention to fraudulently sell a
plot of land of more than 3,500 square meters in Thanh Khe district.
Conveniently offered for sale at a price of 140
billion VND, much lower than the market price because
Binh showed her the red book and
knew that the land owner had authorized the transaction, so the
buyer, Mrs. Binh, trusted Binh and
decided to buy the land to further consolidate.  trust
Binh promised that after signing the deposit contract, he would
carry out the procedures to transfer to residential land and then sign the
transfer to her. By December 25,
2021, the victim signed the contract and
transferred 20 billion VND in deposit to Binh Binh.  She
ran out of money to spend when she
discovered she had been deceived. She reported it to the
police. During the investigation, the
police also received complaints
from two other victims related to the
total appropriation by Binh.  6 billion VND
